What are the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault, and how do they enable secure and decentralized management of digital identities and funds on the Verus network?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault are two innovative features of the Verus network that empower users with secure, decentralized, and self-sovereign management of their digital identities and funds.

**Verus ID and NFT Marketplace:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) directly on the Verus blockchain. This platform enables users to advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized way, without the need for intermediaries. Users can pay or offer to pay from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, which are still auditable by the user. The platform also allows owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy.

**Verus Vault:**
Verus Vault is a security feature that enables users to protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, the user cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked again. However, the user can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. Additionally, the user can still receive funds while the VerusID is locked. To enable revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities, users must have at least one primary identity and one revocation/recovery ID configured.

In summary, the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault provide a secure, decentralized, and self-sovereign way for users to manage their digital identities and funds on the Verus network, with features such as peer-to-peer transactions, transparent and private addresses, and advanced security features to protect funds from theft or loss.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
